1604066113_mirrored_ghost_github.body: @kopy-kate you should not have to run Python as root (sudo), it's bad for security.

1604066122_mirrored_choya-zhang_github.body: I had the same issue. Make sure you've allowed all scripts in NoScript/Tor Browser. ZeroID leaks to clearweb and it gets blocked with NoScript (which is good, but also makes the insecure site impossible to use).

1604066176_mirrored_JazzMaster_github.body:
Not sure why you'd need a ban list, looks like you need more peers that aren't behind a firewall/NAT/Tor. If ZeroNet can't find at least one peer with an open port, it fails to upload.

Try loading your site in a [ZeroNet proxy](http://greenbuddhism.ca:43110/1HeLLo4uzjaLetFx6NH3PMwFP3qbRbTf3D), and then rush to push the new content. It will use that proxy as a server to get the content out past your NAT...

1604066176_mirrored_HostFat_github.body:
I think it would be helpful to include some .onion / i2p based trackers for faster bootstrapping.

Tor users from China are recommended to use [meek pluggable transport](https://www.torproject.org/docs/pluggable-transports), so it might still work. One such tracker:

http://trackeryknvofs3m.onion/
